DOC.brief_summary: It phase IV multicentric , placebo-controlled , clinical trial investigate efficacy safety acitretin combine efalizumab therapy chronic plaque psoriasis . PASI 75 week 24 primary end point . PASI 75 week 12 , PASI 50 week 24 secondary end point . Safety measure monitor serum parameter include AST ; ALT ; gammaGT ; creatinine ; cholesterol triglyceride .
DOC.brief_title: Combining Acitretin Efalizumab Therapy Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Men age 1870 Women postmenopausal Moderate severe chronic plaque psoriasis patient contraindication , intolerance non responsive cyclosporine , methotrexate PUVA PASI > 10 e/o BSA ( Body Surface Area ) > 10 Drug induce psoriasis Pustular erythrodermic psoriasis Fertile woman Pregnancy lactation cholesterol > 230mg/dL e triglyceride > 200 mg/dL Known intolerance efalizumab acitretin Serious infection enrollement History previous neoplasia
